step_data.thought: Looking at the current state of the page, I can see that the transportation mode has already been changed to 'Foot (OSRM)' as indicated by the combobox value in element [166]. The URL also shows 'engine=fossgis_osrm_foot' which confirms this. The directions are already showing for foot travel with the time of 51 minutes. Looking at my goal, I needed to change the transportation mode from car to foot for directions from Central Park to Times Square, which has been accomplished. The page is already showing the foot directions between these locations. There's no need to click the 'Go' button since the page has already updated with the foot directions. I should inform the user that the task is complete.
step_data.action: stop('The transportation mode has been successfully changed from car to foot. The directions from Central Park to Times Square are now showing for walking, with an estimated time of 51 minutes for the 3.8km journey.')
